metadata.title: CVE-2023-49344 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Temporary data passed between application components by Budgie ExtrasWindow Shuffler applet could potentially be viewed or manipulated. The datais stored in a location that is accessible to any user who has local accessto the system. Attackers may pre-create and control this file to presentfalse information to users or deny access to the application and panel.

criterions.comment: budgie-extras package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
